item.title: Headset/ Boom Microphones – Headset Earphones/ Headphones

remarks.para: Either the Captain’s or First Officer’s earphone/ headphone may be inoperative provided associated Flight Deck Speaker is operative.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel "HEADSET EARPHONES INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
